WorkItem.ClosedComment: The No1 goal of Html Agility Pack is to keep original HTML compatible, not to be 100% ok with standards.
WorkItem.Description:
According to XML specs an element content is at least a char data, i.e. #x09 | #x0A | #x0D | [#x20-#xD7FF] and other Unicode symbols. Values in HTML element content such as #x09 | #x10 | #x1D are not filtered which provides an invalid XML. I am not aware of HTML specs but I believe that such non-printable chars are also forbidden.
Â 
Example: http://publisher.pdfchm.net/cmp-books/ - Line: 52, Col: 7789 a #0C value in text leads to invalid XML.
WorkItem.Summary: Non-printable chars in HTML element content
